alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Western Bergen; Western Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 11:43PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...SNOW SQUALL... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1141 PM EST, a snow squall was over Sloatsburg moving east at 45 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Yonkers, Stamford, Norwalk, New Rochelle, White Plains, New City, Port Chester, Ossining, New Canaan, Monsey, Nanuet, Rye, Ramsey, Ringwood and Haverstraw. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Eastern Bergen; Western Bergen; Western Passaic
